query.statement: SELECT V.LINE_ID, V.ORG_TRX_ID, V.TRX_ID, V.UPJANG, (SELECT UPJANGNM FROM SCO_UPJANG_MST_V WHERE UPJANG = V.UPJANG) UPJANGNM, V.SUBST_TYPE, (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'MA0119' AND CODE = V.SUBST_TYPE) SUBST_TYPENM, A.SUBINV_CODE, (SELECT SUBINV_NAME FROM HLDC_PO_SUBINVENTORY WHERE SUBINV_CODE = A.SUBINV_CODE) SUBINV_CODENM, A.TRX_DATE TRX_DATE, A.TRX_TYPE, B.TYPE_NAME, A.TAX_KIND, (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE (GROUP_CODE = 'MA0105') AND (CODE = A.TAX_KIND)) TAX_KINDNM, V.ORG_CUSTCD, (SELECT CUSTNM FROM HLDC_ST_CUST WHERE CUSTCD = V.ORG_CUSTCD) ORG_CUSTCDNM, V.CUSTCD, (SELECT CUSTNM FROM HLDC_ST_CUST WHERE CUSTCD = V.CUSTCD) CUSTCDNM, A.TRX_DESC, V.ORG_AMT, A.AMT CURR_AMT, V.AMT FROM MAS_CUST_SUBST V, MAS_TRX A, MAS_TYPE B WHERE (V.ORG_TRX_ID = A.TRX_ID) AND (A.TRX_TYPE = B.TYPE_CD) AND (V.DELETE_YN = 'N') AND (V.UPJANG = #UPJANG#) AND (A.TRX_DATE BETWEEN #TRX_DATE#||'01' AND #TRX_DATE#||'31') ORDER BY A.TRX_DATE, A.SUBINV_CODE, A.CUSTCD, A.TRX_ID
